definitions.definition: to (cause someone or something to) stop doing a particular activity or stop being active for a period of time in order to relax and get back your strength:
examples: The doctor told him that he should rest for a few days.

definitions.definition: to be an actor who does not have any work:
examples: Over 90 percent of professional actors are resting at any given time.

definitions.definition: said by lawyers in a law court when they have finished the explanation of their case
